original_body_lines: Fadna a renowned brand in Sri Lanka that has contributed to the well-being of the nation for nearly two decades successfully held the 49th Fadna Arunella recently at Kesbewa Sri Wijayasundararamaya.

Fadna Arunella is a day-long program organized to provide free health services to the needy began in 2010. The camp offers a number of medical counseling and health screening workshops.”We believe that everyone should have access to quality healthcare and wellness knowledge for an active healthy life, and we are proud to have the opportunity to make a positive impact on Sri Lankan society through Fadna Arunella” founder of Fadna Chamendra Somatunga said on the occasion.Fadna Arunella Health Camp involved Haritha Mithrathwa Padanama in organising the event and Durdans Hospital with the contribution of resources. Fadna is committed to continue its social responsibility and plans to conduct more health camps in future also continuously. By expanding its project and services, Fadna aims to reach out to people and communities in need, creating a healthier and more vibrant Sri Lanka.
